website_summaries.verdict: A plant-derived dishwasher detergent that enables you to quickly clean even the dirtiest messes.
pros: Features an advanced plant-derived formula unavailable with other dishwasher detergents
Leaves dishes streak-free and sparkling clean
cons: May leave film on dishes that can be difficult to remove
More expensive than other dishwasher detergents

customer_reviews.title: We kept wondering why our dishes weren't getting clean. This is why.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I live seventh generation products, but this is the exception. My wife and I kept trying to figure out if our dishwasher was malfunctioning because every load about 20% of the dishes would come up with food or grit. We finally tried a different detergent and it instantly fixed the issue. Unfortunately, I'd already bought six bottles of this defective stuff... ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Greg Bilsland

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say I thought I was saving money and doing my family good by purchasing this dishwasher detergent...I wasn't. It leaves my dishes dirty: plates, bowls, serving spoons, you name it. My clear glasses have now been clouded and stained after using this product for a few months. I've never had an issue with a dirty dishwasher until I used this product. I use many other Seventh Generation products (and am very happy with them); however, save yourself the money and don't bother with this product. It's a major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jph8881

customer_reviews.title: Used for years - great product
customer_reviews.text: We really like this dishwasher gel. We have used it for years and have been very happy. We actually purchased a mainstream brand recently (in a pinch) and after a few dish loads I had my oldest son and husband both complaining that the dishes were not getting as clean within a few loads. I initially disagreed with them, but after using the majority of the bottle, they were right. I will 100% be sticking with this product moving forward and it is better for the environment!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: New bottle cap hard to open
customer_reviews.text: I have used this detergent for a long time. I try to keep septic system free of harsh chemicals. The latest shipment came with the same bottles but a redesigned cap. The new cap is harder to open since it's a round indentation, not a lip to grab to open. I may have to find another brand since my hand can no longer flip open the top to fill the washer cups. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: DP Cooke

customer_reviews.title: good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 bottles and gave it to my wife. I didn't tell her anything about some of the reviews. And sure enough a couple weeks she said(on her own) it cleaned the dishes but she didn't like the film it left on some of the dishes and glasses. I so wish this would have worked. I used Dimond Bright before which does an excellent job but is so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fragrance-free households
customer_reviews.text: Life this stuff! It's impossible to fund in store near me so I'm glad Amazon carries this. It's a bit more expensive than the lemon version which all my local stores do carry but I dont mind spending the few bucks more for the unscented version in an effort to prolong my silverware. Also its completely unscented which I like - I'm sensitive to scents and have no issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good product its doing its job We like stuff that are less toxic as possible and this is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Roman

customer_reviews.title: Bought by accident but best mistake buy ever
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these by accident thinking they were dish soap. I decided to use one on our son’s bottles since every time I used the one we normally buy, the smell of bleach and chemicals linger on the bottles and all the parts. I would have to rinse them after they were done in the wash. It also made the whole apartment smell like chemicals while I use. BUT SEVENTH GENERATION IS AMAZING. No smell around the house, bottles don’t reek of random cleaners, and it left the dishes so sparkly clean. I’m going to keep buying them! Glad I made this mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it for baby bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Started using it when our twins were born since I wanted something gentle and frangrance free to use for their bottles. It only takes about a tablespoon to do a load (given, I am *very* diligent about pre-washing so there's not a lot of crusty food stuck to the dishes). Been using it for about 6 months and so far am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: TwinMama

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher detergent good but tablets better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dishwasher detergent a few weeks ago. I’ve used the seventh generation dishwasher tablets before and liked them but I don’t really like the detergent. It smells nice but is a little messy and I feel like I don’t get enough compared to the tablets. I also don’t think it leaves the dishes much cleaner. Not very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Too much money for an ok product.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the price. Very expensive for an ok product. Will not order again. What's wrong with you people. Wake up seventh generation and start charging a competitive pricing structure.
customer_reviews.author: Jaap

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using cascade and it always left streaks. I have been using this for about a month and Seventh Gen. cleans my dishes better, without streaks and I feel better knowing that it's more environmentally natural . Will definitely purchase again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Rozmajzl

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Seventh Generation product
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to buy products that are environmentally friendly and does not test on animals. I have three adults that live at my house, so we use the dishwasher all the time. This product cleans the dishes with minimal spotting and no residue despite our hard water. The product is not too strong and is just the right consistency. You cannot tell it is plant based. I have purchased many items from Seventeen Generation and this is one of my favorites. I used to use Cascade, but since the dishes come out just as clean, I will stick with Seventh Generation.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie L. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work, but it just didn’t. Did not clean the dishes all the way through. Many dishes ended up having the remnants of food or other debris baked into the dish making it difficult to remove. Found myself washing dishes before putting them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: NLS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a dishwasher detergent that is more ecofriendly, yet does the job. This is it. Dishes are clean, no spots, no annoying scent that makes your spatula smell like gardenias (and taste disgusting). Just a great product!
customer_reviews.author: KathyJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a 6 pack!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and seems to be a bit healthier than some other formulas used. I haven't seen that this soap works any better or worse than the other soaps I have used, so in happy with it! It gets my dishes clean and doesn't leave a residue.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, right for your dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for our dishwasher since couple of years now. This is the best out there wrt the safety, residue left and the scent. Plus its value for money buying in bulk here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: In a time where cleaning products are extremely hard to come by, these bottles of dishwasher detergent are awesome. They're small, but I'll take 'em! Shipping was pretty swift this time around, too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Everything comes out clean. It’s the only detergent I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: The best dishwashing liquid available
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing cleaner for the automatic dish washer. It is scentless, cleans sparklingly well, and leaves absolutely no residue in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Debra

customer_reviews.title: Clean scent and great cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than local stores. Great neutral, unscented. No funny lemon scent on my dishes or cutting board, like other brands. I use a rinse aid too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well for me, and i never pre-rinse, ...
customer_reviews.text: works well for me, and i never pre-rinse, but i'm on city water, people with hard water may want to try a rinse aid. It's not a strong on burned on food or baked on, but I consider that an acceptable trade off for a nontoxic detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford J.

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well, effective soap.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how good this soap is for the price. Great value, without having to re-run dishes. And the packaging within the box makes sure the product shows up without spilling all over, and the design of the soap containers makes it so people who don't have a lot of grip strength can use these without negotiating child-proofing measures.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this detergent doesn’t leave a scent. Especially on plastic products. Great job cleaning dishes. I simple rinse before putting in the matching and the detergent takes care of the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dias

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the fact that I can order on Amazon in ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets my dishes clean and a little really goes a long way! I LOVE the fact that I can order on Amazon in bulk. Just great for people who MUST HAVE FRAGRANCE FREE!!!! Thank you Seventh Generation!
customer_reviews.author: riri

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Cleans dishes just as good as the detergent with toxic ingredients. I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Lunden

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, non-toxic and doesn't require a lot
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. This cleans really well without leaving a film or residue that some of the mainstream detergents leave. I don't need to use a lot and like that it is a non-toxic more sustainable formula.
customer_reviews.author: Buy ‘N Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Clean and no strong smell
customer_reviews.text: This product has no smell. It does work to clean my plate and glasses cups. Especially this product is environmentally save. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as any of the typical brands that use bleach
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as any of the typical brands that use bleach, and I'm glad to know be assaulted by bleach smell every wash, or worrying anymore about what harsh chemicals might still have lingered on our dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Loh

customer_reviews.title: Works better than conventional dishwasher soaps
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this dishwasher gel from Cascade and I love it!. It smells wonderful, is better for the environment and I don't have to worry about the chemicals left behind on my dishes like I did with other soaps/powders/tablets/gels... We do have hard water, very alkaline, so we do still get water spots on the glasses, but that's not an issue of being unclean. I rinse the dishes (not wash) before loading them, to get the bigger gunk off - our dishwasher is older and can't do it all anymore, but I have had no trouble with this dishwasher gel itself. I love it and am a convert!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product n price
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leave spots or residue on dishes but still gets them clean!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Many years use
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for 4 years. Clean and no scent. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, doesn't smell like chlorine so I've even put plastics in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Sue Harrington

customer_reviews.title: great for washing baby products
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. I quickly learned after I had a baby that you cannot wash baby bottles with scented dish detergent. The bottles really held in to the orangy lemon smell. I also decided I didn't want the rest of my dishes to have nasty chemicals and be smelly either. So we switched to this one. It works perfectly and has no scent. I will never use anything else. It's so easy to order in bulk too. Much cheaper than buying in store.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. We are using way less and getting out dishes clean!
customer_reviews.author: Drew E Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a good price. Really like I can purchase six at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not impresses
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the way it cleans in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Vidya

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic pods!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to switch from packs back to liquid. This seems to be easier on my appliance as well, but still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey D.

customer_reviews.title: This is my final decision.
customer_reviews.text: End up keep coming back to this one. I cheated with different products on and off. I always end up with this one. Therefore I should married to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hirokoppe

customer_reviews.title: came ask expected
customer_reviews.text: I have used 7th generation while in the hospital with other products. I am hoping this works.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya E Lang

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Gentle, unscented, and effective. I put everything in the dishwasher now.
customer_reviews.author: Alana D.

customer_reviews.title: Safer Choice for your family
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted for our family. We really disliked the heavy chemical residues left on all of our dishes by the commercial cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie

customer_reviews.title: Works great, caps arrived busted.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dishwasher detergent, it’s worked great for me. Just really annoyed that four of the six caps arrived broken. They need better packaging for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Amos

customer_reviews.title: safest option i could finde
customer_reviews.text: safest option I could find, happy to no longer smell perfumes on my glasses and dishes
customer_reviews.author: Working hard for my consumer dollars!

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This dishwashing detergent works great! I feel good about using this product because it's more natural, and it was nice to be able to order a bunch of these at once so I don't have to worry about reordering anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ott

customer_reviews.title: Need better shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but shipping is not great. First it came a day late even though I have Prime and ordered it before window of time. Second, 4 of the 6 caps are busted/cracked. Have to remember to keep the cap that isn't busted to use on the others. Just a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher detergent
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this detergent for about a year now. Love that it has better ingredients than what we used prior. Can’t say anything bad about it. No residue, a case will last me a while and I run dishwasher daily.
customer_reviews.author: KATHRYN QUICK

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Way to Get Seventh Generation Dish Detergent
customer_reviews.text: Convenient way to order large quantities of Seventh Generation Dishwasher Detergent, which is my go-to brand.
customer_reviews.author: E.P. Clark

customer_reviews.title: no odor
customer_reviews.text: only dw detergent I know that cleans and does not have odor
customer_reviews.author: Perfectionist Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, been using for years. Cleans well, better for the environment. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: julie a.

customer_reviews.title: Great free and clear product
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product by the case as I cannot get it locally. It is great. It is a free and clear product and I do not react to it which is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Melinda Connor

customer_reviews.title: ALL 6 BOTTLES ARRIVED BROKEN AND UNUSABLE. HAD TO RE-ORDER 2 DAYS LATER.
customer_reviews.text: ALL 6 BOTTLES ARRIVED BROKEN AND UNUSABLE. HAD TO RE-ORDER 2 DAYS LATER. ENTERED ONE STAR RATING ONLY BECAUSE IT WAS IMPOSSIBLE TO ENTER NO-STAR RATING!
customer_reviews.author: JMKM6

customer_reviews.title: Works great and leaves no smell
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like the smell that a regular dishwasher detergent leaves on the dishes. This detergent cleans well but leaves no smell. Also it contains no bleach which I like.
customer_reviews.author: mittal shah

customer_reviews.title: It's matter.
customer_reviews.text: I can say with a high degree of certainty that this dish detergent has not set my kitchen on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to have found a fragrance free dishwasher soap that I did pay the extra bucks for it; to my surprise it doesn’t really clean the dishes😞. I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They send broken bottles
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived and one of the caps is missing on the bottle. My only option was to return the entire box of 6 bottles and I needed the dishwasher liquid so it was a huge inconvenience!
customer_reviews.author: MamaWithGraceAndStyle

customer_reviews.title: good as prewash
customer_reviews.text: we use this in combination with the seventh generation dishwasher packs. we use this gel as the prewash and the packets for main cycle. we tried this gel for both cycles and the dishes were not nearly as clean.
customer_reviews.author: kcmo.me

customer_reviews.title: Balsam of Peru allergy friendly
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here. It's dishwasher detergent. I suppose it cleans well. I have a crummy old dishwasher that you have to pre-wash all the dishes before you put them into the dishwasher where it supposedly washes them. My daughter has a crazy chemical allergy and this is what we can now use.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Seems okay but doesn't do the job like the serious ones
customer_reviews.text: Seems okay, but doesn't do the job like the serious ones (Cascade). Sometimes the more expensive name brand is actually worth it. And I think they've all removed phosphates at this point, so not sure how much greener this one is vs the Cascade or anybody else.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine but it smells gross, causing the dishwasher to not smell very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Soap
customer_reviews.text: Leaves dishes clean without any greasy or soapy residue and without any unnatural "soap" scent - who wants their dishes to smell like lemon?!?
customer_reviews.author: Layerd

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is fine but package had issues
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is fine but package had issues. I bought 6 pack package and one of the bottle was obviously used one and it was leaking all over. One of them had the lid broken. I am too lazy to return this keeping it but so disappointing
customer_reviews.author: dmswjd123

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pack of 6, 2 of the bottles were broken with product spilled everywhere, including making the box so soggy that I couldn't use it for a return. Not a huge deal, but obviously now I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Best Eco Brand I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product exclusively for 2 years. It cleans dishes really well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, clean stuff
customer_reviews.text: In my dishwasher this product works miracles on my dishware and glasses, no pre-rinsing required. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Santo

customer_reviews.title: Highly functional but not as functional as mainstream
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as Cascade but we need to buy Seventh Generation so that market forces will generate a ecofriendly AND highly effective cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great! However 5 of the 6 bottles were delivered with broken flip tops :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eco-Friendly Dishwashing  Liquid
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this was damaged and never delivered. I have had to reorder. I wish amazon would automatically reship.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Bethli

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works and doesn't release aerosolized chlorine into my home
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It gets my dishes clean and is safe to use. I purchased through Amazon because I have to drive 45 min to find a store that sells it near my home. Amazon's prices are better too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Schneider

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love all seventh generation products! I want something that will not leave chems on my dinner plates...um who wants to eat soap? not me that is why I love this! will not harm my septic tank either..
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Zemlicka

customer_reviews.title: The best fragranace-free dishwashing detergent I have found
customer_reviews.text: Works well, no streaks on dishes. It is hard to find a good fragrance-free dishwashing detergent - this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Bad bottles
customer_reviews.text: One of the six came in a defective bottle. The whole box was ruined by detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Corwin Smidt

customer_reviews.title: Seventh Generation Dishwasher Gel
customer_reviews.text: Great Product as all Seventh Generation Products. Does a good job without all the chemicals. Keeps the dishes clean and spotless.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dishwasher gel
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, either the people who rate this product poorly don't know how to load dishes in a dishwasher or their machine just sucks. It's that simple.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: didnt get our dishes clean so we bought 7g power plus gel instead
customer_reviews.author: T.Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly bought this thinking it was regular dishwashing soap but I ended up loving this! I like that there is no crap in it.
customer_reviews.author: Innyc

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy seventh generation products!! Bottle is leaking or is it tampered with?
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles was leaking and was covered with a plastic bag.some GENIUS at the factory must have come up with this idea!! How do I know no one tampered with this bottle? I would have returned the all 6 bottles, except the return date has expired. I will be canceling my subscription for all Seventh generation products!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Reports investigation...
customer_reviews.text: If it had not been for the following (9/07), I'd have given this a 3 rating. However, on an investigation of biodegradable "green" products, Consumer Reports wrote: (RE:) "Biodegradable" detergents. Seventh Generation Automatic Dishwashing Gel is said to break down in the environment. But the claim broke down when we found that the product contains a petroleum-derived agent that doesn't readily biodegrade. A spokeswoman said the company would remove the claim and review its product line and labeling. Biodegradability of two other detergents--Earth Friendly Product's Wave automatic dishwasher gel and Planet Ultra Dishwashing Liquid--was certified by reputable independent groups."
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Works well and we appreciate that it is not so harsh in terms of chemicals and chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for years in our dishwasher with pretty good luck. It doesn't work quite as well as the very high-chemical versions like Cascade, but we like that it is a little safer for us and the environment and are willing to wash dishes just a tad more before we put them in the dishwasher. Our dishes always smelled strongly of chemicals when we used the stronger stuff and I felt the need to run them through again to rinse them, which didn't seem to be a good use of water and was very time-intensive. We are pleased with this and buy it in bulk every few months.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No Residue
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try out a better dishwasher detergent as we have a terrible and cheap dishwasher that is not great at cleaning dishes. It is a very cheap model and frequently leaves residues. This product leaves no residue behind on my dishes, and they all come out clean! Worth the money! I will point out that the bottles are smaller than traditional bottles of dishwasher detergent- it's hard to tell when you're shopping online. They are closer in size to a bottle of dish soap you wold keep on your counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen I

customer_reviews.title: best diswasher detergent
customer_reviews.text: i love this detergent. i needed something in liquid form, since I have small children who like to investigate the pods. I also wanted something that cleaned well and did not leave a residue on the dishes. this fit the bill and has a pleasant smell. i also like that i can measure out the amount i want to use if i do not have a full load of dishes. very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Leila Samhan

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and good for Mama Earth
customer_reviews.text: Another Seventh Generation product that rocks my world and keeps it clean. This company makes it easy to take care of Mama Earth. It is posphate-free. ("Phosphorus is a powerful fertilizer, so when it goes into the water it can cause algal blooms. This leads to the water supply becoming contaminated with toxins that the algae produce, which causes a host of ecological and human health problems.") It is powered by plant-derived enzymes. I have used it in two different dishwashers and it cleans very well without leaving a nasty chemical smell. It's a product I can trust and it works. PS: Remember today's dishwashers are pretty powerful, so no need to pre-rinse your dishes.
customer_reviews.author: sab007

customer_reviews.title: Simply a good product each and every time.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I know I've reviewed Seventh Generation products a lot but hey, I use what works. If it ain't broke... Dishes are clean and there's no toxic fragrance exiting during the 'hot' cycle. It's a win-win especially with a new stainless interior dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Mover & Shaker

customer_reviews.title: No smell and natural
customer_reviews.text: This is the only natural dish detergent that actually works well. I stopped getting the powder ones when they were leaving a lot of residue on the baby's stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Yellsy

customer_reviews.title: but this seventh generation dishwasher detergent is not best choice I chose
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to try all natural products; but this seventh generation dishwasher detergent is not best choice I chose; it always leaves white powder kind on dishes. we need to carefully see and was again before use. pathetic..
customer_reviews.author: Murthy Patnaik

customer_reviews.title: Bottles not completely full
customer_reviews.text: The bottle says 42 ounces each. I am into my third bottle and each bottle has had less than 42 ounces. This bottle has just over 12 ounces in it. Extremely unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for 5 years. It cleans well and is perfect for people who have sensitivity to fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't suds up, doesn't cut grease, nor remove stuck on food. I usually like Seventh Generation but I'll find something else for dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: The best thing to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I only use Seventh Generation. It is so nice to buy it in bulk on Amazon. It doesn't have a strong smell. If your looking for one that smells they do have others. I just wanted an odorless one. Made from plants and no chemicals or dyes used.
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It works but not as clean maybe thats what you gotta bear with when you want all natural stuff for your baby. I use this to clean my baby bottles and toys so im happy that it doesnt leave any chemical smell on her bottles
customer_reviews.author: Tien Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Coffee stains in my cups with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed that I bought a 6 pack. It leaves stains in my coffee cups. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used this soap for my dishes!!! Its good however it does not get much foam so i need to use morer than the usual amount. Otherwise its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Msg

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Dishes come out super clean
customer_reviews.text: This is our go to dishwasher detergent to avoid dangerous chemicals for our family. We love it. Dishes come out super clean.
customer_reviews.author: MetroMomClub

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is the best natural dishwasher gel I've found. Seems to work well. (I read recently that we should use powder instead of liquid) but who knows? This may also come in a powder form but I like the ease of using the liquid. I couple this with a high quality dishwasher, and a natural product to alleviate spotting. It's not the cheapest route but using non-toxic products makes a difference. This seems to last for a while and clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Professional Psychic

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: If it's not working, try using dishwasher cleaner (as in clean your dishwasher empty with that specific product), then try this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mad doesn't begin to describe how upset I am with this crappy product... and I bought a CASE of it! I'm not sure what it does inside the dishwasher, but it doesn't clean dishes, doesn't remove coffee or tea stains from mugs or cups, doesn't get food particles off of silverware, and can't remove grease from ANYTHING. What a complete waste of time, money and water. This product owes ME stars!
customer_reviews.author: goveg

customer_reviews.title: just love it
customer_reviews.text: i just love this liquid. its very hlight. its very healthy for ur children. it does not contain weired textures after dishes are dry.
customer_reviews.author: imr

customer_reviews.title: Weak detergent doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This detergent doesn't properly get dishes clean. Won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kubs

customer_reviews.title: Cleans dishes without the chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The powder version is a better deal, but this works! Easier, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: Favorite dish detergent. It cleans the dishes well and leaves no residue.
customer_reviews.author: JLP22

product_meta.title: Seventh Generation Dishwasher Detergent Gel Soap, Free & Clear, 42 oz, Pack of 6 (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Dishes should be odorless and clean after you wash them, right? We think so too. That's why Free & Clear Seventh Generation Dish Detergent Liquid Gel uses plant based enzyme blends for high cleaning power without the use of dyes and fragrances. This dishwasher soap is free of phosphates and chlorine bleach, and it's biodegradable so you can always feel good about what you dish out. It is truly a great choice amongst the dishwasher detergents. For more than 25 years, Seventh Generation has been thoughtfully formulating safe and effective plant based products that work. Really well, thanks to which this dishwasher detergent liquid is really effective. Our dishwasher liquid uses powerful plant based ingredients like surfactants and enzymes to break down tough residue and lift away food leaving your dishes sparkling clean. Yet you can call it a natural dish soap. So how does it all work? The enzymes in this natural dish soap cut through grease and food by breaking down starch and protein based residue while the surfactants remove dirt and grease by holding the molecules in suspension, so they can wash away. Yes, even those fussy egg stains. That's what our dishwasher soap can do. Based in Vermont, Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. B Corps are certified to be better for workers, better for communities, and better for the environment. By choosing Seventh Generation products, you’re joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations. *Safe when used as directed
feature_bullets: Seventh Generation Free and Clear Advanced dishwasher gel cuts through grease leaving dishes streak free and sparkling clean
Safe* and effective formula of this liquid dishwasher detergent is made with plant based ingredients
Dishwasher detergent liquid free of fragrances, chlorine, phosphates, and dyes
This Seventh Generation dishwasher soap has USDA Certified Biobased Product 65 percent
This dishwasher detergent is made in the USA with US and imported ingredients. Cruelty free
Natural dish soap caring today for the next seven generations
